description:
Enjoy volleyball with easy to learn controls!
Of course you can play normal style with 6 players, but you can even play beach volleyball!
Choose from over 40 different uniform designs!
Try out new almost unbelievable stages such as a casino and a pirate ship!
Strategy and teamwork are the key to victory!

[Practice Game]
Enjoy casual matches by yourself! Select various balls and modes and set yourself apart with special training!

[Friendly Game]
Play competitively or cooperatively with up to 4 people! Play on a normal court or on unique courts loaded with fun gimmicks!

[Team Selection]
In the style settings you can change your character's uniform, power-up items, and customize their eyes and hair color! Name your favorite players and make your own one of a kind team!

[Tournament]
Take on Nationals and the Beach Volleyball Tournament! Defeat strong rivals and aim for the top!

[Capsule Serve]
Use points to get new items! You can get various uniforms and power-up items to take your team to the next level!

[Mini Game]
Challenge yourself in Point Receiver! Receive all the incoming balls that you can and rack up the points!
name: Desktop Volleyball
